full_summary:
# Office Seating Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01019092

**Title**:
- **English**: Office Seating
- **French**: Fauteuils de bureau

**Introduction**

The Government of Canada, Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), invites suppliers to express their interest in providing office seating solutions for the National Capital Region. This procurement is being conducted under the General Stream, covering the requirements of the National Capital Region.

**Background**

NRCan requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating by March 31, 2023. This requirement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCAFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPAFTA), and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA). Procurement will be conducted in accordance with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) regulations.

**Security Requirements**

This procurement involves security requirements that must be met. Suppliers must consider these requirements when preparing their bids. Additional information can be found in the bid solicitation document.

**Eligibility**

Only suppliers who have been pre-qualified and have been issued a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid. Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders may submit a bid but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation. Non-SA holders will not be awarded a contract unless and until the SAA has issued an SA to the supplier for the required products and services.

**Procurement Method**

Procurement will be conducted through a competitive and selective tendering process.

**Additional Resources**
For information about becoming a pre-qualified SA holder, please contact:
- **Email**: RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Contact Information**: [Contact Information)

Notice of Proposed Procurement documents and supporting documents are available on Canada’s Buy and Sell website (*https://buyandsell.gc.ca/*). Suppliers intending to participate must send an e-mail to Shazeen.Dhanani@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca to express their interest.
